Plot: The filmmaker's subjects are patriotic young Americans - ordinary men and women who heeded the call for military service in Iraq - as they experience recruitment and training, combat, ...
Title: The Ground Truth
Actors: Robert Acosta, Kelly Dougherty, Patricia Foulkrod, Nicole Huze
tomatoConsensus: The stories the soldiers have to tell are eye-opening and wrenching to hear; collectively it's a searing peek into the toll of war both during and after.
